remarks: Different translations with the same trace cannot be the identity. (Contributed by NM, 26-Jul-2013.)
statement:
trlnid.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
trlnid.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
trlnid.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlnid.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlnid $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ G e. T ) /\ ( F =/= G /\ ( R ` F ) = ( R ` G ) ) ) -> F =/= ( _I |` B ) ) $.
